overview: Part of Tutto Verdi series - Attila (2010) Parma. 'Attila' is an opera in a prologue and three acts by Giuseppe Verdi to an Italian libretto by Temistocle Solera, based on the 1809 play 'Attila, KÃ¶nig der Hunnen' ('Attila, King of the Huns') by Zacharias Werner.  The opera received its first performance at La Fenice in Venice on 17 March 1846.
title: Attila
